message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really appreciate it.  I'm willing to let it go for $135.  What do you think?
Hey Alice, $135 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $125.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate you're interested, but $125 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $130. This is my final offer - I can't go any lower.  Let me know if you're interested.
